website_summaries.verdict: Dauber Dots are a nice alternative for kids who already have a lot of art supplies, or for smaller children just starting out.
pros: Work well with finger paint paper
Children who have a hard time coloring will also really enjoy these dot markers
Comes with pages to use markers on and downloadable pages to supplement
cons: Tend to dry out quickly and are not as washable as other markers

customer_reviews.title: NOT WASHABLE
customer_reviews.text: These DO NOT WASH OFF of skin or clothing. Here is a picture from the next day; post-hand washing and bath.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Not washable! Ruined my new table!
customer_reviews.text: I just gave these to my son for Christmas. There are other brands that were cheaper but I opted for these because they were advertised as washable, non toxic, and with a "hassel-free" cleanup. I've had this wooden table for a month now and my son has used every crayola product on it and playdough and there has never been a stain until the use of these! I'm so upset. This table was not cheap and was supposed to last for years to come and with one use of these markers its been stained. Ive scrubbed 5 times so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT washable at all!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how other posters say that these wash off easily. That's not even close to being true!!! These markers are extremely messy!!! My daughter's hands and arms were covered in ink and it wouldn't wash off at all, with wipes or soap. Even after a long bath, she had stains on her hands. Unfortunately for me, she loves them and isn't bothered by the stains. The colors are bright and the markers do work but they are definitely NOT washable.
customer_reviews.author: MusicFanatic

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend these markers
customer_reviews.text: These dry out VERY quickly. I would not recommend these markers. Despite being VERY diligent about replacing caps right after use, they have dried up already. (within a month) There is still plenty of ink in them bc I can hear a lot of it when I shake them but nothing comes out. Disappointed for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Heather F

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I teach preschoolers and I was excited to get this set of markers. I live in Europe and products like this are not as easy to find. I love that you can download three different sets of printables to go with the markers. Unfortunately, they don't work as well as I expected. My granddaughter used a different brand at the library and they seemed easier. My set seems to have a couple of dried out markers, especially the orange. I've used them several times and still some of the same problems. I little disappointed, especially since I just can't go to a local store and replace them.
customer_reviews.author: lisboa

customer_reviews.title: Great dot markers & amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.text: **Edited for update** This company’s customer service is amazing! I notified them of the missing lid & they overdelivered on fixing the problem! And as stated before, these dot markers are great quality & include actual dot pages, plus a website full of free downloads for additional pages. This was a great purchase! Highly recommend this company! *Original review* The only downfall of this product is that when we opened the packaging, one of the Dot Markers didn’t come with a lid. :( Unfortunately we bought this for homeschool & didn’t open the package until a few days after the return window. But other than that these are fabulous markers & love the activity insert that’s included!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money on these you will be throwing full ...
customer_reviews.text: The sponges broke off of most of these. I run a daycare so when we do activities I am right by them making sure they dab not "draw" with them but once the sponges dry they started to crack and rip off. Dont waste your money on these you will be throwing full dabbers away like me :(
customer_reviews.author: DLS1404

customer_reviews.title: I don't like these markers
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps it's just the set I received but these are some DRY markers. I've turned them upside down for days trying to moisten the tip, I've held the tip to the paper for what seemed like forever & no matter what I do every time these markers are used they are dry. Like with normal pressure on paper you would have to repeat the same dot 100 times to get complete coverage. I'm annoyed with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Olson

customer_reviews.title: Water colors for kids
customer_reviews.text: Picked these up when they appeared on deal of the day. Package arrives with coloring pens and printed templates and link to their site for downloading more. Colors themselves are easy to use - being used by 4 year olds at my home. Color is water based and easy to wash off. It is easy to apply but also not runny to the point that it will make a mess on paper / play area. Assorted colors are denoted by the caps and sticker on the pen and the body has a curve close to the tip for easy grip and handling by kids. Would recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Vipul

customer_reviews.title: Could Use A Few Improvements
customer_reviews.text: They arrived with the blue leaking everywhere and for some reason it seems like it releases ink without being pressed because it drips when you turn it over to use it. The first few times you dab the ink comes out really quickly and tends to pool, but after that it is much easier to manage. If you hold them down more than a second, it'll start to bleed through cardstock, so keep that in mind. The colors get brighter as the ink dries and they do dry quickly, which is a great plus. Even with the negative aspects, I still think these are a great buy and I'd purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Kate M.

customer_reviews.title: Yeah it's not washable, but kids are
customer_reviews.text: These paints aren't washable in the sense that it comes off after a hand washing or a table scrubbing. However, all you have to do is put some cardboard under the project the little artist wants to work on. Kids are easily scrubbed down. What's life without a little paint stain on our hands? Easy to use, fun to work with. We don't do tablets or smart phones in our house. So, I am always looking for creative ways to spend time that is quality time with my son. These paint dots are super fun and fit the bill for a creativity outlet. Great price because I got them during a "lightening" deal. Otherwise, I probably would have not purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Prudence Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea for littles
customer_reviews.text: These are great for little kids - especially with the free print outs. It's not as intimidating as coloring and is a little more structured(daubing the dots:). The ink is a little heavy at first but after using it once it's perfect. This is the fourth set I've bought - I've given away two as gifts already and have a back up too but the first set still has tons of ink so They last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Martha C.

customer_reviews.title: Fun and engaging activities!
customer_reviews.text: If I could rate these daubers and Cameron Frank products more than 5 stars, I would!!! I am teaching a preschool children with disabilities summer program in our district (during the school year, I am a dyslexia specialist and special education teacher). I downloaded the activity sheets for numbers, letters, and animals. The children LOVE them! I have three aids and they were all equally thrilled.Thank you so much for your product, as all educators I'm looking for meaningful, appropriate activities for our students. They love daubing their numbers, letters, and animals!!
customer_reviews.author: MLDjerseyshore

customer_reviews.title: Fun - mess free activity!
customer_reviews.text: Great set for my 5 year old! It’s easy enough for her to screw and unscrew the tops. The colorful polka dot and corresponding color name helps her identify the colors and her site words for reading. It came with cute activity cards where each is expressing different emotion which is a helpful tool with toddlers! The activity cards are small and you can go through them all in one sitting but thankfully they gave a card with their website to download 100* more activity pages to print ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R Vitali

customer_reviews.title: HAHAHAHA MESS FREE
customer_reviews.text: Mess free unless you are a 2 year old without boundaries and think your face would be better if it were blue. Washable if caught in 2 minutes after applied to skin. If not, maybe you have the kind of child who will lose it every half hour to 45 minutes for the 3 days it takes for the ink to fade, because she “no want bue fingers”. Maybe you don’t. Maybe you are buying these for your sister-in-law’s child, and you really want to give her a reason to regret white carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Beware of skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter last year and we just got around to using them. She got some on her face and it burned her skin- it looks like a chemical burn! I was so shocked. She has never had any reaction to any paint or anything before. Makes me think that this might be counterfeit.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tiny artists
customer_reviews.text: My one and four year old lOVE these dot markers. They are easy to hold and way less messy than paint. The colors are vibrant and fun. These markers are also really good for practicing letters for older kids. As stated on the box, they do not wash easily off of skin. I had no problem washing out of clothes or the tile floor. I do recommend doing these outside, just to be safe. My kids always get dirty with art projects so this didn’t really bother me.
customer_reviews.author: mamabirdchronicles

customer_reviews.title: Not really kid friendly
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to purchase these for my kids as I have seen alot of workbooks with the stamping markers and thought this was a great deal. These are bingo markers -- not really made for kids. The kids struggle to open them up -- which totally defeats the purpose of having them self entertain ;) The ink dries out pretty quickly and the variety of colors was limited. They did the trick for now but I will definitely look for more kid friendly/marketed stamping markers in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kirkdiggler

customer_reviews.title: Dobber here and there
customer_reviews.text: My little guy LOVES using dobbers at school. So when these were up on a lightening deal ~ I ordered. Quality product, easy to use and very satisfied 4 yr old in my house. We currently are on vacation and he insisted on bringing them 😄 Caps seal for storage and we have been very satisfied with use so far. Dobbers are easy for young hands to manipulate and offer gross motor skills practice while having fun. Coloring books or blank paper these are fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: LLO

customer_reviews.title: My kids love these dot markers!
customer_reviews.text: These washable dot markers are perfect for teaching my toddler numbers, letters, fruits, etc. The box came with a set of activity sheets with different faces that display different emotions. My kids thoroughly enjoyed coloring these sheets with the dot markers and trying to imitate the faces on the sheets. The dot markers are very well made and the ink does not leak or bleed. The size of the markers is great for my toddler's little hands. Bonus: You can go to the Cameron Frank Products website and print out additional activity sheets for these dot markers for FREE. Can't wait to use these to homeschool my toddler!
customer_reviews.author: Mombrite

customer_reviews.title: Preschooler enjoys
customer_reviews.text: My preschooler enjoys playing with these and enjoyed the sheets that came with the “markers”. However, as a Mom, they are a bit messy. The ink comes out very watery, so requires they lay out and dry like a water color paint rather than a marker. We use a plastic mat underneath to protect the table. The color does seem to wash off hands the same as an average marker. These are the first dot markers we have used so I don’t know if this common for this style of marker.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: These were a gift for my Godbabies
customer_reviews.text: I really do love products like these. They're safe for young children and they're long lasting. I bought these for they're 2nd Bday and we immediately opened them to start our art project. The ink doesn't pool out like other dot markers and it's quick drying so as to not smudge but also you can move the paint with a paint brush before it dries. Definitely will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Scfred

customer_reviews.title: Great homeschool tool!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely perfect for a small kid or even a adult ( I think I had just as much fun as he did). Very easy to clean and very easy to use. Only down fall is it’s more like water color in a tube vs a marker so if you have a wild one like I do and he’s know for slamming them own on the paper, you might end up with some colorful splatters on your kitchen wall ( we do). Other than that one downfall they’ve been super easy to clean and handle and actually make very pretty and colorful pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy these because I felt they were expensive for a kids paint product but when they arrived I was pleasantly surprised. They are definitely high quality. The paint is brightly colored (and easy to clean up!) the markers are definitely long lasting as you can see/hear the paint in the tube. I can’t imagine these will dry out for a very long time. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: They Leak!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my 7 year old son to use with the pictures that came with it. After using the green one time he went to put another daub (dot) on the paper and the liquid went everywhere. I cleaned around the tip and did not see a hole. I replaced the cap and when i opened the green again it just poured out. Same thing happened after using the pink and blue. The only one the still works is the brown. (which my 7 year old doesn't like). Very poor quality. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: As a former preschool teacher, I had used other dot painters before, but the Dauber Dogs really impressed me with their quality. I like that the shape of the painter fits really well in children's hands and that the round cover is easy for even my toddler to take on and off. The colors are so vibrant and my son's LOVE the free coloring sheets that we have downloaded from the website! The two of them will spend long periods of time painting independently and love to share their masterpieces with our family & friends!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Senaha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for young hands.
customer_reviews.text: Great for my toddler granddaughter. Love the pages that can be downloaded to color. This allows endless use. Just wish the washable markers were a little more washable. So a messy shirt would still be a recommendation. The colors are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Preschooler loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old is not an artsy kid, but had a lot of fun making art with these. They are super simple to use, and didn’t make a mess at all. We opened them yesterday, and he already asked to use them again today. Big hit! Editing my review. These are great to use, but we’ve had two instances of them leaking badly, and staining. The caps are plenty tight enough, but they still manage to leak all over the place while being store. They must be kept upright.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Markers for Kids.
customer_reviews.text: These Dot Markers are perfect for Children. I have to admit when my wife first got them I instantly thought of the Bingo Dot Markers. I never really thought to use them for Children's art. My son loved them and you don't have to worry about them smashing the tips like normal markers.
customer_reviews.author: BakkenTech

customer_reviews.title: These are not washable
customer_reviews.text: These are advertised as washable, but on the packaging it says they are not. It's actually pretty specific to not get them on anything and immediate rinse with cold water, treat with a stain remover and wash if you do. If you are looking for washable daubers to play bingo with the kids with, you will be disappointed. Luckily I havent gotten them on anything.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly8258

customer_reviews.title: Fun but can get messy
customer_reviews.text: A lot of fun for my 1.5 year old son. The first few minutes may require an adult to get the ink from the marker out. Pushing down too hard on them can cause them to bleed and it can be a bit messy. However, they are washable and we found that Castile oil soap works the best to get it out of clothing and skin.
customer_reviews.author: C. Seely

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these markers! My 3 year old son is developmentally delayed and hates to color. His Occupational Therapist suggested these and he has really enjoyed them. They help with coordination as well as handling and fine motor skills. It releases just the right amount of ink unlink some other brands that just bleed way too much. The colors are vibrant and come in just the right variety. My 8 year old niece also loves playing with these so they are versatile for all ages! All in all, this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect activity to keep kids busy with out you losing your mind.
customer_reviews.text: Picture it. March 2020. You’re practicing social distancing and are working from home with a toddler. My three year old enjoys these. They don’t leak and he can pound them all over the paper. I like that they don’t make a huge mess and are fairly washable. Good times happening in the quarantine of 2020.
customer_reviews.author: jamesonmichelle

customer_reviews.title: My little loves these.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 yr old for school. My 9 yr old loves is to. They fit my Little’s hand very nicely. So far, they have not been very messy. I do use a clipboard under the paper to protect his desk. My daughter doesn’t. It has not affected her desk yet. They dry quickly. I was quite surprised how quickly they dry.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Baumann

customer_reviews.title: Website to get pictures not accessible!
customer_reviews.text: I would given a 5-star rating, but you cannot download dot pictures off their website! Very disappointing!! I also use caution with the word "washable"as states. Some colors simply didn't like blue, red, and green. However, these dot markers are wonderful for little artists! My 2 year old granddaughter loves them and you could tell she felt successful!
customer_reviews.author: Growser

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 4 and 5 to do arts and craft and also do patterns. The color comes out easily. I like the fact that you have to twist the caps back on vs snapping it on because its easier for my kids to twist. Great for many learning activities and it also comes with a few stamp pages. There is also a link included that you can go on and get free dot print out activites.
customer_reviews.author: Tong

customer_reviews.title: Work well for me.
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of worried about purchasing these because so many people said it was not washable, stained everything and the sponge deteriorated quickly. I cannot speak to the detonation rate of the sponges as they just arrived today but they are most definitely washable. The only way I can see the paint not washing off is possibly if you didn’t use soap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with these!
customer_reviews.text: Y'all these are amazing! I have 2 very busy toddlers and they BOTH sat down for an hour or more playing with these markers! It came with 10 coloring sheets in the box, that were facial expressions (fun!) And I went on their website and downloaded so many more pages to color! Tontop it off, I gave them my order # and they sent me a box of crafty connects which sell for $34! I will definitely be purchasing from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Hughes

customer_reviews.title: SUPER MESSY AND HARD TO COME OFF
customer_reviews.text: bought this as a gift for my toddler I loved the concept and thought it would be less off a mess than regular markers. This is just makes to much of a mess the color leaks out excessively and it all over, the best way to describe it is watery paint. It is washable but I had to wash my daughters hand 4-5 times throughout the day for it to come completely off. good concept but do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: sandra figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Not easily washable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my almost 2 year old. She enjoyed them but they are not as washable as I expected. You need soap water and a nice effort to get the dye off her fingers. This is not ideal for me as I was looking for something To entertain her without having to constantly watch. Would not recommend for a child who likes to write on walls etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not non toxic if ingested
customer_reviews.text: These are decent dot markers for the price. However beware.. they are not non toxic if ingested. Disappointed any company would make a products for young kids that isnt safe. I guess that's why they are cheaper than some others. Really wish Crayola would make these!
customer_reviews.author: diane n

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend the washable markers. The box the markers came in was the perfect size and sturdiness. Easy to keep the markers organized in the box for the next use. The markers themselves were nicely made and seemed to have plenty of ink. What sold me 100% on this product was the letter/picture activities in the back of the box. Was definitely a bonus surprise! My 3 and 1 year old have lots of fun using this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Not washable!
customer_reviews.text: Although these markers are advertised as washable they are not washable. Pretty misleading to put that on the label. Took a day to come off my daughter's hands. I previously bought a different brand which was a good quality do a dot paint. This one is not bold enough to attract kids. It's bit overpriced for the quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Elen

customer_reviews.title: 3 Year old loves them
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves these! They wash off easy if you get them on hands. And it's very easy to print out pictures online to use. It keeps her entertained for a long time!!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten D.

customer_reviews.title: They aren't washable.
customer_reviews.text: Upon getting the box it says to rinse immediately and keep away from pretty much everything in your house as it may not wash off... I do not consider that washable. I returned them to get a water based set more likely to wash out when toddler oops happen.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Denise

customer_reviews.title: ♡
customer_reviews.text: My one and three year old love these. The ink comes out a little fast if squeezed. We use them outside just incase. As stated on packaging ink does not wash off skin well. I had no issue getting it off a pair of non porous shoes. The included coloring papers were a huge hit.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Cece

customer_reviews.title: Messy
customer_reviews.text: These things are messy!!! My 2.5 and 4.5 yo are rough with these and sling paint everywhere and it does not wash off well! I loved the idea of these bc they smash their crayola marker tips down so thought these would be better. Better for older kids
customer_reviews.author: nicole hamilton

customer_reviews.title: NOT washable!
customer_reviews.text: They are NOT truly washable. They clean off my stone-top table easily with water, but they leave serious color on skin. We used them for the first time yesterday and the ink is still on their skin this afternoon, even after regular hand washings all day. Haven't noticed any on clothes yet, so I'm not sure about that washability. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: A. Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for for my 2.5 year old daughter under recommendation from her pre-school teacher. She has a blast using them. The box comes with a free website were you can print off a lot of extra worksheets on top of the ones they send in box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner454

customer_reviews.title: Fun colors and great for young kids!
customer_reviews.text: These markers are a good, fun tool for little kids. Purpose is to draw with dots, and kids can layer colors and use the free activities included. Older kids can use them for writing, but the flow of the markets is not as good as when using for dots. These would be great for bingo. One problem is that they aren’t immediately washable off hands and can bleed through to table surfaces, which would be a concern in terms of staining. Overall, great colors and a fun product.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Waltz

customer_reviews.title: Some colors spills out too quickly
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited about this but the color spills out too quickly and made a huge mess. The blue color pretty much spilled out when we first try to use it and the color went all over the place. Then the yellow did the same. Some of the colors were ok and didn’t rush out
customer_reviews.author: __ceeceeH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 2.5 year old! :)
customer_reviews.text: Got these to give to my 2.5 year old son for Christmas but I am on maternity leave now and HAD to break them out early bc he is going bonkers inside the house, not to mention that I need to keep him busy while nursing a newborn. He loves loves loves them! Kept him busy for about an hour!! Winning!!
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Arce

customer_reviews.title: Terrible  product and misleading description.
customer_reviews.text: Product description says washable but on the package it says "keep ink from carpet, wood, vinyl, wall and other materials that cannot be washed in washing machine". In other words "Keep it out of home". I made mistake of blindly believing the description and my carpet is all pink. Used baby wipes and still cant get it out. Attached image. Its hard to avoid ink overflow because it come as liquid spills all over when dabbed on paper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watery and they make a mess.
customer_reviews.text: I've used other brands of dauber markers, and I found these to be extremely watery. The liquid literally poured out of the markers. They leaked ALL OVER the trunk of my car. And yes, the tops were all screwed on tightly.
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: It's only a circle if you work for it.
customer_reviews.text: Ink doesn't really dispense in a dot. You usually get a half moon and have to prime the marker tips every time you use them. Lots of pushing down and wiggling over the whole surface of the circle to get the ink to come down. Not something a two year old wants to wait for. I think I'll stick to regular markers, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: KerriSC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These are very easy to use, and the colors are very bright. It comes with the eight markers/daubers and some activity pages. I let my five year old do one of the pages to see how easy they'd be for him to use. He loved it! I had some concerns about how much bleeding there might be, so I included a picture where I used them on a Post-It pad. There was a little bleeding but not much, especially if you're careful about how hard you press.
customer_reviews.author: Kati Schoffstall

customer_reviews.title: These are not good for toddlers (as it says on the description)
customer_reviews.text: These are not good for toddlers (as it says on the description), since toddlers are messy and these colors don't come off the skin easily (or clothes!!). And some toddlers are still putting all in their mouth (like my 16 mo old), so imagine the disaster!! They are good for older kids though, like 3+. My 4 y.o. loved them. The colors are pretty and it is always fun to have different techniques of paints to keep them busy.
customer_reviews.author: Caronaf

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and wash dot markers
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the price! The attached worksheets they email you with the purchase of these dot markers is incredible. Extra resources like this make teaching fun! I would definitely recommend these washable dot markers to any elementary classroom!
customer_reviews.author: Mia Sol del Valle

customer_reviews.title: Not washable for clothing - it says so on back of pack!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and another brand due to daycare asking for daubers and none in stores. I got both packs and glad I read the backs - this title says it is a washable item but then on the packaging says not washable for clothing, or that it must be dealt with immediately! As a mom of a toddler laundry can't always be dealt with immediately - these were for daycare - so I returned them to get true washable ones.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I didn't get the activity pages promised! ☹️
customer_reviews.text: If I'd received the promised sheets of printed pictures to allow my granddaughter a chance to try them the way they were meant to be used, and it didn’t take 3 baths to remove all the traces of ink from her body... I'd have likely given them 5 stars ...
customer_reviews.author: AudiMoonKat

customer_reviews.title: Love these markers!
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely love these markers! I love how they came with little emotion templates and you can download more for free off their website, some people said they weren’t washable so I was hesitant and although after washing their hands they the stains weren’t completely off by bath time they were gone! Not a huge deal to me because they have fun using them and keeps them busy!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Ledesma

customer_reviews.title: Fun for my toddler!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my two year old as an cleaner way to 'paint' when I don't feel like getting the actual paint out. She loves them. They are pretty clean, though the ink does take a minute to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Lillydogg

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining for grandkids!
customer_reviews.text: Grandchildren loved it! Arrived during the Christmas holidays and it kept them entertained. They used their imaginations for making Christmas art for family which of coarse everyone loved!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money or the clean up time involved
customer_reviews.text: Three dot paints arrived damaged, with the purple having leaked all over the box and other paint bottles. I hoped for the best, cleaned up the mess and let my daughter start using the other colors. Unfortunately, the paints are so runny that they are leaving puddles all over the paper. This is NOT designed well for the targeted ages, and is going to be a pain in the neck for supervision and clean up. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: T.G.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, leaky markers!
customer_reviews.text: I am outraged with these markers. After using them for a week, they started leaking all over my hardwood floors and my tot’s hands, which are very hard to wash away. What a rip off!
customer_reviews.author: Nil

customer_reviews.title: Easy for young children to use.
customer_reviews.text: These are very well made, the ink flows well (maybe a little to well) and my kids are able to handle these with ease. The ink does run quickly whenmpushed to hard so supervision with younger children is important.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: I thought the item came with an activity book but ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought the item came with an activity book but it's a digital activity book. I bought this as a gift and then needed to find activity books so the product could be used as intended. Arrived quickly and packaging is bright and colorful. I can't attest to the actual daubers since I am giving it away as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: J. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Leak alert!!
customer_reviews.text: These were nice when we opened them. The red leaked when the box was laid on its side. I tightened it a little, and the head of the tube snapped off; I caught it before it was a complete mess. I'm a grandma; I didn't give it that much power. Beware any child could do this spilling the entire contents...
customer_reviews.author: jle

customer_reviews.title: Caution, not washable :(
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to use these with my daughter but have been disappointed. These are supposedly washable, but that hasn’t been our experience. They don’t come off your hands after repeated washing with soap and water (the ink is on my hands still as I type this), and the warning label on box says not to get on any material that can’t be immediately put in wash machine but they’re messy and splatter and easily. We’ll be throwing these away unfortunately. Maybe if you have an especially neat kid these will work? That’s not me though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and fun colors!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter loves the set and so do I!! The colors arrived this morning and we used them as soon as they came. She had so much fun she said it feels like Christmas :)
customer_reviews.author: Rox

customer_reviews.title: Not washable markers
customer_reviews.text: This is very valuable choice of all However quality is not good as I expected. It is not washable as described. When my son playing with that it splashed all around. It stay on my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: lily mikula

customer_reviews.title: My kiddos love these
customer_reviews.text: I and my kiddos love these. I do wish it came with more coloring pages. I know they have the dowloadable ones but i dont have printer at home to be able to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea S.

customer_reviews.title: Great colors but hard to use
customer_reviews.text: I like the colors of these. However they are hard to get the paint to come out and I got these for my toddler to use. Other brands seem to be easier to use for her.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie O

customer_reviews.title: They leak ALOT
customer_reviews.text: I am a preschool teacher as well as a mother of two young boys, so I was excited to get more of these because we have another brand that we love! My kids use these all the time. However, these leak TERRIBLY and are unusable because they are so messy. I definitely would not recommend these. Honestly the ones we got at the dollar tree were better quality and I expected more. We were highly disappointed because just by taking the lid off it causes them to leak everywhere. Completely unusable!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kid friendly for sure!
customer_reviews.text: We love this product. My toddler is currently having a great time stamping the activity pages and learning about emotions with them. We deducted 1 star from a perfect review because the packaging indicates there are 10 activity pages + a bonus page and when we opened the box we are missing some pages. Overall it seems to be a great product and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Fun AND *Almost* Mess Free!
customer_reviews.text: I got my daughter an easel for her birthday. I was hesitant to buy her paints because of the mess factor, but these were a great second option! She loves “painting” with them!
customer_reviews.author: Kaila N.

customer_reviews.title: These things are great if you have tidy kids
customer_reviews.text: Not washable! These things are great if you have tidy kids, but mine are now painted multiple colors and a dousing in the bath with soap wouldn't get it off their hands and faces... Also stains furniture. Please change the title of these markers, as they are not washable!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Davies

customer_reviews.title: Great value for dot markers
customer_reviews.text: Everywhere I have looked got these, they were so expensive for what they were. I bought these on sale and my son has had so much fun with them! We use them during or homeschool prek lessons. He Looks forward to they opportunity and these were the best value I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: These are great easy to use markers. My youngest is not the best at putting caps on markers and they have not dried up too much because of that which I am extremely happy about. They are easy to use for kids of any age (or adults)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Watson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My 5 year old loves to use these every day! Love that they come with some starter activities to try out the markers and keep the kids occupied and learning! Not difficult to use at all!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT take on an airplane!
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for an activity to entertain our kids on the plane & these came up. Bad idea. They caused our 9-year old to be pulled aside for extra security screening. The only thing that saved the markers from being confiscated was the fact they were still in the shrinkwrap. Put them in our checked bag on the way home. Had a little note that it had been searched. Feel sorry for whoever had to go through all our dirty laundry!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I love the colors that come in this set and how ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors that come in this set and how accurate they are when my son uses them. The caps are easy for my son to get on and off and the paint does not splatter. Plus, they're washable which makes it even better since he's a toddler. We also love the free activity sheets!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun fun
customer_reviews.text: Great for toddlers and preschool kids, can be a bit messy so hold off on handing a younger kid the color blue, but really fun especially when mixed with a large cardboard playhouse that needs coloring.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and paint flows during use
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these. Bought a dofferent brand previously that was difficult to keep painting with because it dried put. The liquid inside these is more watery which makes it easier for kids to use continuously without having to press down hard to get paint to flow.
customer_reviews.author: Specialk87

customer_reviews.title: very fun, but not washable
customer_reviews.text: So so fun, my daughter just turned three today and was in love with these. Vibrant colors, easy to manipulate. My only gripe is that they're not super washable. They came off her hands with soap, but i the few splatters on her clothes will need some special treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hansen Horlacher

customer_reviews.title: Works as they should
customer_reviews.text: I like them dotters. They aren’t as bright as other that I have used but still show up enough. I like that they don’t splatter as mush as other daubers. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: NOT Washable
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be a fun addition to our art supply, however they are not washable. They have stained our white table and it took 4 baths with scrubbing to get the ink off my child's body. The fun isn't worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Kskwared

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great company
customer_reviews.text: Good product, great company. My son accidentally deleted his tongue and I panicked, and called the company who promptly (like no joke within 12 minutes) called me back to let me know it was not toxic!
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: Messy.
customer_reviews.text: I used them with my toddler so we did get ink everywhere. FYI does not wash off that easy off skin. I can not leave them stored on their side because they leak. Made such a mess
customer_reviews.author: Alicia & Armando Medina

customer_reviews.title: The colors are awesome and the kids love them
customer_reviews.text: The colors are awesome and the kids love them. They are pretty large and seem that we will get a lot of uses out of them. After I received the Dabbers, I received an email with free printouts for the kids to use the dabbers on. The only thing I noticed was a few of the dabbers really need to be slammed down to get a good amount of ink on the paper. I would recommend these to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: nora

customer_reviews.title: MESSY, horrible for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT get these for your toddler. They are not washable. My hands and my daughters hands are covered in ink and it will not wash off. This project is beyond messy and a pain for any mother.
customer_reviews.author: TheDFamily

customer_reviews.title: Not washable
customer_reviews.text: These are not washable. They have stained my daughter’s craft table. Only way we got the stain remnants off was with rubbing alcohol. And it came off my daughter’s hands after washing with soap, rubbing a little rubbing alcohol and a couple more hand washes the next day. They are easy to use, but would only recommend for more school-aged children who would be careful to not stain everything. Not for kids under 4-5 in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: A must have for your art supply cabinet
customer_reviews.text: These have provided my children HOURS of creative fun and I love that they help my kids with their hand-eye coordination. The colors are washable so when I find a stray dot on my wall or dining room chair, I’m not terribly upset.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend this paint set! My 3 kids ranging from age 2-6 have been using them non stop since Christmas! They have held up so far with lots of use! They can be creative with little mess:)
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: My kid approves!
customer_reviews.text: Got it out for my daughter and she fell in love. The colors are vibrant and the activity pages are fun. I kept her at a table to use it so it was easy cleanup. Love the product!
customer_reviews.author: Crysanna Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Break easily
customer_reviews.text: I love these markers but they break so easily. I haven't used them many times and the yellow and orange both broke. I'm out of my return window so now I have to buy more. I'm pretty sure I will buy a different brand after this, even if they are more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Pignatelli

customer_reviews.title: Fun activity for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr old has gotten so much use out of these. It is even fun for him to take the lids on and off. He enjoys this fun way of “coloring”.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend! They were a hit with my girls!
customer_reviews.text: My girls loved theses! SO easy for them to hold, dried pretty quickly and they felt like they were getting to do something so cool because of unique design - felt more like painting to them which they loved! Plus I loved that they came with free activity sheets inside as well as the ability to download more if you wanted! Great product, would totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: William Van Camp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Activity for Kids!
customer_reviews.text: Dauber Dawgs is an amazingly creative activity set that keeps my 3 year old busy! She loves coloring with her daubers and also learning new words that are on the activity sheets that come with the set. I was shocked that from these simple to use activity sheets, she learned how to write her first few letters by herself! I highly recommend Dauber Dawgs for a fun, learning activity for young kids!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not for kid use despite what they say, not washable.
customer_reviews.text: These are adult bingo dabblers, not for kid use like it is advertised. They do not wash off anything. If I was in the store and would have read the back I would have put them back. If you have small kids these are not for you.
customer_reviews.author: amurray

product_meta.title: 8-pack Washable Dot Markers / Bingo Daubers Dabbers Dauber Dawgs Kids / Toddlers / Preschool / Children Art Supply 3 Pdf Coloring eBooks = 100 Activity Sheets To Do!
feature_bullets: ALL FUN, NO MESS: Kids will love the creative freedom of painting; Parents will love the simple setup and easy cleanup of washable dot markers.
DOWNLOADABLE ACTIVITY SHEETS: Receive 3 activity books with over 100 fun and educational PDF pages. Just print and play!
ENCOURAGE CREATIVITY: Creative play promotes early childhood development, hand-eye coordination and color recognition.
EASY GRIP DAUBERS: Slender enough for little hands to grip with a full 3 ounces of ink per paint marker.
SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: If you’re not 100% in love with your dot art markers, contact us for a full refund – no questions asked.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,451 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
